EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Capture Manager that their Opportunity Estimated Award Date is due within 2 Days
EmailTemplate.name: ANZ Award Date 48hr
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required: Opportunity '{!Opportunity.Name}' Estimated Award Date due in 2 Days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As Capture Manager this email is to notify you that your opportunity {!Opportunity.Id} - {!Opportunity.Name} is due within 2 days.
Please update the 'Estimated award date' if it is incorrect or update the opportunity 'Stage'.
For any further information please contact your local Salesforce Champion or send an email to anzsalesforce.help@aecom.com
